tasks.title: Enhance Elements System
tasks.description: Complete the ElementsManager interface and element type registration system to match the JavaScript implementation
tasks.details: Implement complete ElementsManager interface matching `editor/elements/manager.js`. This includes element type registration, element collections and models interfaces, comprehensive element views type system, element type validators and error handling, and support for custom element types.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate against JavaScript ElementsManager implementation, ensure all methods and properties are typed correctly, test element registration workflow

subtasks.title: Analyze ElementsManager Implementation
subtasks.description: Analyze the JavaScript ElementsManager implementation and identify missing methods and properties
subtasks.details: Study the complete ElementsManager class in elementor-dev-js/editor/elements/manager.js to identify all methods, properties, and functionality that needs to be typed. Compare with current implementation to find gaps.

subtasks.title: Enhance ElementsManager Interface
subtasks.description: Enhance ElementsManager interface with proper error handling and validation methods
subtasks.details: Add TypeScript interfaces for error handling during element registration, including TypeError for invalid elements and Error for duplicate registrations. Implement proper validation logic.

subtasks.title: Improve ElementBase Interface
subtasks.description: Improve ElementBase interface to match JavaScript implementation
subtasks.details: Enhance the ElementBase interface to include all necessary methods and properties. Ensure proper inheritance chain and add methods for element validation, type checking, and lifecycle management.

subtasks.title: Add Widget Fallback Logic
subtasks.description: Add widget fallback logic and elementor.widgetsCache integration
subtasks.details: Implement proper typing for the widget fallback mechanism when exact widget types aren't registered. Add integration with elementor.widgetsCache and proper widget type resolution.

subtasks.title: Implement Container Element Support
subtasks.description: Implement Container element support with experimental features integration
subtasks.details: Add proper TypeScript support for the Container element type, including conditional registration based on experimental features flag. Ensure proper integration with elementorCommon.config.experimentalFeatures.container.

subtasks.title: Test and Validate Implementation
subtasks.description: Test and validate the enhanced ElementsManager implementation
subtasks.details: Create tests to validate that the enhanced ElementsManager interface correctly types all functionality from the JavaScript implementation. Verify element registration, error handling, and widget fallback logic work as expected.

tasks.title: Complete Container System
tasks.description: Enhance Container interface to fully match the container.js implementation with panel integration and model binding
tasks.details: Complete Container interface matching `editor/container/container.js`. Include container panel integration, container model with data binding, container hierarchy and relationships, and container rendering and lifecycle management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test container creation, manipulation, and destruction. Verify panel integration and model synchronization

tasks.title: Expand Editor Base Interface
tasks.description: Enhance ElementorEditor interface to cover all methods and properties from EditorBase class
tasks.details: Add missing properties like widgetsCache, loaded, previewLoadedOnce. Implement missing methods including getElementData, mergeControlsSettings, getControlView, getPreviewView and all other methods from editor-base.js
tasks.testStrategy: Compare interface with actual EditorBase implementation, ensure all public methods are properly typed

tasks.title: Implement Command System Framework
tasks.description: Create comprehensive command system with base classes, document operations, panel commands, and element manipulation
tasks.details: Expand command base classes with proper inheritance, implement document operation commands, add panel manipulation commands, create element manipulation command interfaces, implement command history and undo/redo system, add command validation and error handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test command execution, validation, and history management. Verify inheritance hierarchy works correctly

tasks.title: Implement Document System
tasks.description: Create complete document component system with save functionality, history, and element relationships
tasks.details: Implement document component base classes, document helpers and utilities, element-document relationships, global document state management, document save and auto-save functionality, document history and versioning.
tasks.testStrategy: Test document creation, saving, loading, and history management. Verify element-document relationships

tasks.title: Implement Admin Module Types
tasks.description: Create comprehensive admin module interfaces covering beta tester, floating elements, templates, and maintenance mode
tasks.details: Implement beta tester component types, floating elements system types, new template dialog types, admin feedback system interfaces, maintenance mode functionality types, Gutenberg integration interfaces, menu handler types.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate against admin JavaScript modules, test all admin component interfaces

tasks.title: Expand Editor Components
tasks.description: Implement template library, icons manager, dynamic tags, settings, and browser import components
tasks.details: Template library component system with full CRUD operations, icons manager component with icon registry, dynamic tags component with tag resolution, settings component with configuration management, browser import component with file parsers, selection component, validator component.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each component individually and integration with main editor system

tasks.title: Implement Controls System
tasks.description: Complete all control types including box-shadow, dimensions, gaps, and control behaviors
tasks.details: Complete all control types (box-shadow, dimensions, gaps, etc.), control behaviors and interactions, control validation and sanitization, control groups and repeaters, conditional control display logic.
tasks.testStrategy: Test all control types, validation, and behavior systems. Verify control groups and repeaters work correctly

tasks.title: Implement Frontend Widget Handlers
tasks.description: Create specific widget handler interfaces for common Elementor widgets with registration and lifecycle management
tasks.details: Specific widget handler interfaces for common widgets (Accordion, Tabs, etc.), handler registration and lifecycle management, widget configuration and state management, event handling system for widgets, responsive behavior handling, animation and transition support.
tasks.testStrategy: Test widget handler registration, lifecycle, and event handling. Verify responsive behaviors

tasks.title: Complete Frontend System
tasks.description: Enhance frontend document management, elements handlers manager, and utilities
tasks.details: Frontend document management, elements handlers manager enhancement, frontend utilities and helpers, responsive breakpoint handling, performance optimization types.
tasks.testStrategy: Test frontend system integration, document management, and performance optimizations

tasks.title: Enhance Utilities and Helpers
tasks.description: Implement advanced utility functions, event system, hooks, and React integration helpers
tasks.details: Advanced utility functions, event system enhancements, hook system improvements, notification system types, React integration helpers.
tasks.testStrategy: Test utility functions, event system, and React integration. Verify hook system works correctly

tasks.title: Implement Type Safety Validation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive type checking and validation system to ensure interface completeness
tasks.details: Type-only tests to verify interface completeness, integration tests with actual Elementor codebase, validation against JavaScript implementation, performance testing for type checking.
tasks.testStrategy: Run comprehensive type checking, validate against real Elementor usage, performance benchmarks

tasks.title: Create Documentation System
tasks.description: Generate comprehensive documentation with JSDoc comments, usage examples, and API reference
tasks.details: Comprehensive JSDoc comments for all public interfaces, usage examples for complex systems, migration guides for breaking changes, API reference documentation.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify documentation completeness, test examples, validate API reference accuracy

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize TypeScript compilation performance and runtime type checking
tasks.details: Optimize TypeScript compilation performance, minimize runtime impact, implement efficient type checking, optimize bundle size for type definitions.
tasks.testStrategy: Performance benchmarks, compilation time tests, bundle size analysis

tasks.title: Integration Testing and Validation
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing with real Elementor projects and community validation
tasks.details: Test with real Elementor projects, validate with community feedback, ensure backward compatibility, performance validation, integration with popular development workflows.
tasks.testStrategy: Real-world project testing, community beta testing, performance validation, compatibility testing

tasks.title: Fix Core Module System Accuracy
tasks.description: Address critical accuracy issues in core Module and ViewModule classes identified in coverage analysis
tasks.details: Fix ViewModule missing findElement() method, enhance Module event system with space-separated events and auto-method calling, add missing __super__ property, implement complex constructor behavior with instanceParams handling, add missing scroll utility methods (getElementViewportPercentage, getPageScrollPercentage).
tasks.testStrategy: Validate against actual JavaScript implementation, test event system complexity, verify findElement functionality

tasks.title: Implement Missing Frontend Utilities
tasks.description: Add 42+ missing frontend utility classes identified in analysis - Icons Manager, Lightbox, Video API, Anchors, Assets Loader
tasks.details: Implement Icons Manager (createSvgElement, createSvgNode), Lightbox system (LightboxManager, Lightbox, Screenfull), Video API (BaseVideoLoader, VimeoLoader, YouTubeLoader), Anchor utilities (handleAnchorLinks, scroll-snap awareness), Assets Loader (dynamic script/style loading), URL Actions, Flex Horizontal Scroll, E-Icons utility.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each utility class functionality, integration with frontend system, validate against JavaScript implementations

tasks.title: Implement Missing Frontend Handler Classes
tasks.description: Add 21+ missing handler classes - Container, Section, Carousel, Global handlers and subdirectories
tasks.details: Implement base-carousel.js (12KB complex functionality), image-carousel.js, column.js, global.js handlers, Container handlers directory (container.js, grid-container.js, shapes.js), Section handlers directory (section.js, shapes.js, stretched-section.js), Accessibility handlers (nested-title-keyboard-handler.js), complete Base handler missing properties (onElementChange, onEditSettingsChange, onPageSettingsChange, unbindEvents).
tasks.testStrategy: Test handler registration and lifecycle, validate specialized functionality, test container and section handling

tasks.title: Implement Editor Panel System Types
tasks.description: Create comprehensive panel system types - 60+ missing files for core editor panel functionality
tasks.details: Implement Panel Structure (panel.js, layout.js, header.js), Panel Pages (elements/ directory with 10+ files, element browser and categories, models and collections, search and filtering), Panel Views (page management, page switching and routing, panel state management), Edit Mode (mode switching, panel mode changes, content editing workflows).
tasks.testStrategy: Test panel navigation, element browser functionality, panel state management, edit mode transitions

tasks.title: Implement Editor View System
tasks.description: Create complete view system types - 50+ missing view files for element views, panel views, navigator views
tasks.details: Implement Element views (BaseWidget, Widget, Section, Column views), Panel views and pages, Navigator views, Preview management views, View hierarchies and relationships, View lifecycle management, View event handling and communication.
tasks.testStrategy: Test view rendering, hierarchy relationships, event propagation, lifecycle management

tasks.title: Implement Editor Model System
tasks.description: Create complete model system types - 15+ missing model files for element models, settings models, collections
tasks.details: Implement Element models (BaseElementModel, Widget, Section models), Settings models, Collection models, Model relationships and data binding, Model validation and sanitization, Model event system and change tracking, Model persistence and synchronization.
tasks.testStrategy: Test model data binding, validation, relationships, change tracking, persistence

tasks.title: Expand Command System Coverage
tasks.description: Add 125+ missing command files - Panel commands, Document commands, UI commands, Save commands
tasks.details: Implement Panel commands (18 files in regions/panel/commands/), Document commands (35+ files in document/*/commands/), Navigator commands (4 files), UI commands (copy, paste, duplicate), Global commands (enable, disable, unlink), Dynamic commands (enable, disable), Browser import commands (validation, import), Save commands (draft, publish, autosave).
tasks.testStrategy: Test command execution, validation, undo/redo functionality, command dependencies and workflows

tasks.title: Complete Component Systems
tasks.description: Implement 112+ missing component files - Documents, Template Library, Settings, Preview, Selection, Browser Import
tasks.details: Implement Documents Component (component.js 212 lines, document management and switching), Template Library (25+ files, views, collections, behaviors, import/export), Settings Components (6 files, page settings, editor preferences), Preview Component (initialization, device mode handling), Selection System (manager, multi-selection, UI updates), Browser Import (file validation, import dialogs, progress tracking).
tasks.testStrategy: Test component integration, template operations, settings persistence, selection management, import workflows

tasks.title: Implement Editor Utilities and Helpers
tasks.description: Add 20+ missing editor utility files - Editor helpers, image management, presets factory, conditions
tasks.details: Implement conditions.js (conditional logic comparison), container-helper.js (manipulation), context-menu.js (right-click menus), control-conditions.js (visibility conditions), controls-css-parser.js (CSS parsing), files-upload-handler.js (upload processing), font-variables.js (font management), heartbeat.js (WordPress integration), images-manager.js (asset management), presets-factory.js (preset generation), promotion.js, query-params.js, select2.js, stylesheet.js (dynamic CSS), color-picker.js.
tasks.testStrategy: Test utility functionality, integration with editor systems, WordPress integration, file handling

tasks.title: Fix Type Accuracy Issues
tasks.description: Address identified type accuracy problems - Events system, Breakpoints, Time utilities, React integration
tasks.details: Fix Events System (static vs instance class mismatch, bcEvent parameter, jQuery handling), Breakpoints (add getDesktopPreviousDeviceKey, getDeviceMinBreakpoint, getActiveMatchRegex methods), Time Utilities (getUserTimestamp, timezone offset, ISO8601 formatting), React Integration (React 18+ createRoot vs legacy ReactDOM.render), Notification System (toast positioning, animation effects).
tasks.testStrategy: Test corrected implementations against JavaScript originals, validate behavior consistency, test React integration

tasks.title: Implement StretchElement Tool
tasks.description: Add missing StretchElement tool - 100% missing critical frontend functionality
tasks.details: Implement StretchElement tool (stretch() method, reset() method, direction and container selection logic, CSS output generation), integrate with frontend tools namespace, add proper TypeScript interfaces for StretchElementSettings, implement tool lifecycle and event handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test stretching functionality, CSS generation, integration with frontend system, tool lifecycle management

tasks.title: Enhance Third-Party Integration
tasks.description: Complete third-party integration types - WordPress, jQuery extensions, Swiper implementation details
tasks.details: Expand WordPress integration (heartbeat integration, media library, admin bar integration), enhance jQuery integration (Elementor-specific extensions, serialization utilities, HTML5 drag & drop), complete Swiper integration (handler implementation details, Elementor-specific configurations).
tasks.testStrategy: Test third-party integrations, WordPress functionality, jQuery extensions, Swiper configurations

tasks.title: Create Type Coverage Validation System
tasks.description: Build automated system to validate type coverage against JavaScript implementation
tasks.details: Create automated coverage analysis tool, implement JavaScript-to-TypeScript validation system, build coverage reporting dashboard, establish continuous integration for type coverage monitoring, create regression testing for type accuracy.
tasks.testStrategy: Test coverage analysis accuracy, validate reporting system, test CI integration, verify regression detection

metadata.description: Comprehensive TypeScript coverage improvement tasks based on detailed analysis - expanded from 15 to 28 tasks covering critical gaps in Core, Frontend, Editor, and Utility systems. Major progress: 9/28 tasks completed including all critical foundation tasks.
